description: Episode of Series "PGR Series". The PGR team answers specific questions sent in by viewers from all over Australia. Subjects covered include sleep problems, teaching young children different languages, expressing and storing breast milk, nutritional problems and health matters, such as trimming babies' nails., appropriate sun protection, circumcision, flat feet and weak ankles. We also offer tips for concerned parents of adopted children, compare different methods of introducing the alphabet to pre-schoolers, and discuss what is "normal" behaviour in young boys.
